267 
268 double GetDiffXSectionH(double theta, double energy) {
269  double t = energy / 27.21;
270  double c = cos(theta * KConst::Pi() / 180);
271  double k = 2 * sqrt(t * (1 - c));
272  return 4 * (8 + k * k) * (8 + k * k) / pow(4 + k * k, 4);
273 }
274 
275 void AddArgonDiffXGraph(KIntCalculatorArgon* calc, TMultiGraph& mg, int dataColor, int interpolColor) {
276  map<double*, double>* data = calc->DEBUG_GetSupportingPointsDiffX();
277 
278  const double SHIFT = 1e20;
279 
280  const unsigned int POINTS = 45;
281 // const double ENERGY_LOW = 1;
282 // const double ENERGY_HIGH = 1e6;
283 // const double ENERGY_DELTA = (log10(ENERGY_HIGH) - log10(ENERGY_LOW)) / POINTS;
284 
285  const unsigned int SIZE = 37;
286 
287  const double ENERGY_MAX = 600;
288  const double ENERGY_MIN = 0;
289 
290  double *x_data = new double[SIZE];
291  double *y_data = new double[SIZE];
292  double *x_inter = new double[POINTS * POINTS];
293  double *y_inter = new double[POINTS * POINTS];
294  double *z_inter = new double[POINTS * POINTS];
295 
296  double *x_inter_fa = new double[POINTS];
297  double *y_inter_fa = new double[POINTS];
298 
299  ofstream out("TestInteractionArgonDiffX.log");
300 
301  double t = 300 / 27.23;
302  double anAngle = 0;
303  double c = cos(anAngle * KConst::Pi() / 180);
304  double k = 2 * sqrt(t * (1 - c));
305  double s = 4.0 * (8.0 + k * k) * (8.0 + k * k) / pow(4.0 + k * k, 4.0);
306 
307  cout << "c = " << c << "; k = " << k << "; s = " << s << endl;
308 
309  double sigma, energy = 15, angle;
310  for(unsigned int i = 0, o = 0; i < POINTS; ++i) {
311  angle = 180.0 / static_cast<double>(POINTS) * static_cast<double>(i);
312 
313  for(unsigned int n = 0; n < POINTS; ++n) {
314  energy = ENERGY_MIN + (ENERGY_MAX - ENERGY_MIN) / static_cast<double>(POINTS) * static_cast<double>(n);
315 
316  sigma = calc->GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt(energy, angle);
317 
318  x_inter[o] = energy;
319  y_inter[o] = angle;
320  z_inter[o] = sigma * SHIFT;
321 
322  out << "[" << o << "]: (" << x_inter[o] << ", " << y_inter[o] << ") = " << z_inter[o] << endl;
323 
324  if(10 == i) {
325  x_inter_fa[n] = energy;
326  y_inter_fa[n] = sigma * SHIFT;
327 // cout << "[" << n << "] " << x_inter_fa[n] << " = " << y_inter_fa[n] << endl;
328  }
329 
330  ++o;
331  }
332  }
333 
334  energy = 2000;
335  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < POINTS; ++i) {
336  angle = 180.0 / static_cast<double>(POINTS) * static_cast<double>(i);
337 
338  sigma = calc->GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt(energy, angle);
339 
340  x_inter_fa[i] = angle;
341  y_inter_fa[i] = sigma * SHIFT;
342  }
343 
344 // unsigned int i = 0;
345 // for(map<double*, double>::iterator p = data->begin(); p != data->end(); ++p) {
346 // if(p->first[0] == energy) {
347 // x_data[i] = p->first[1];
348 // y_data[i] = p->second * 1e20;
349 // ++i;
350 // }
351 // }
352 
353 // TGraph* dgraph = new TGraph(SIZE, x_data, y_data);
354 // dgraph->SetMarkerColor(dataColor);
355 // dgraph->SetLineColor(dataColor);
356 // dgraph->SetMarkerStyle(20);
357 // dgraph->SetLineWidth(1);
358 
359  TCanvas canvas("myCan2", "", 800, 600);
360 // canvas.Divide(1, 2);
361 
362 // canvas.cd(1);
363  canvas.SetLogz();
364 
365  TGraph2D* graph = new TGraph2D(POINTS * POINTS, x_inter, y_inter, z_inter);
366  graph->SetMarkerColor(interpolColor);
367  graph->SetLineColor(interpolColor);
368  graph->SetMarkerStyle(1);
369  graph->SetLineWidth(1);
370 
371  canvas.SetPhi(210);
372  graph->Draw("TRI2");
373 
374  TGraph2D* p = new TGraph2D();
375  p->SetPoint(0, 400, 5, 34.3 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
376  p->SetPoint(1, 400, 20, 3.4 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
377  p->SetPoint(2, 400, 30, 1.01 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
378  p->SetPoint(3, 400, 50, 0.305 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
379 
380 // p->Draw("same p0");
381 
382  graph->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Energy in eV");
383  graph->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Angle in degree");
384  graph->GetZaxis()->SetTitle("#sigma_{ion} in 10^{-20} m^{2}");
385 
386 // canvas.cd(2);
387 
388  TGraph *g = new TGraph(POINTS, x_inter_fa, y_inter_fa);
389  g->SetMarkerColor(interpolColor);
390  g->SetLineColor(interpolColor);
391  g->SetMarkerStyle(1);
392  g->SetLineWidth(1);
393  g->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Angle in degrees");
394  g->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("#sigma_{ion} in 10^{-20} m^{2}");
395 
396 // g->Draw("AL");
397 
398  TGraph *g2 = new TGraph();
399  g2->SetMarkerStyle(8);
400  // 400 eV
401 // g2->SetPoint(0, 5, 34.3 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
402 // g2->SetPoint(1, 20, 3.4 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
403 // g2->SetPoint(2, 30, 1.01 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
404 // g2->SetPoint(3, 50, 0.305 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
405 // g2->SetPoint(4, 10, 16.5 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
406 // g2->SetPoint(5, 15, 7.42 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
407 // g2->SetPoint(6, 25, 1.72 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
408 // g2->SetPoint(7, 35, 0.688 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
409 // g2->SetPoint(8, 40, 0.515 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
410 // g2->SetPoint(9, 45, 0.394 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
411 
412  // 500 eV
413 // g2->SetPoint(0, 5, 32.8 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);

415 // g2->SetPoint(2, 15, 6.59 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
416 // g2->SetPoint(3, 20, 2.94 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
417 // g2->SetPoint(4, 25, 1.48 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
418 // g2->SetPoint(5, 30, 0.881 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
419 // g2->SetPoint(6, 35, 0.605 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);

423 
424  // 2000 eV
425  g2->SetPoint(0, 5, 24.6 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
426  g2->SetPoint(1, 10, 6.31 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
427  g2->SetPoint(2, 15, 1.86 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);

430  g2->SetPoint(5, 30, 0.226 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
431  g2->SetPoint(6, 35, 0.136 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);

433  g2->SetPoint(8, 45, 0.0630 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
434  g2->SetPoint(9, 50, 0.0416 * KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * SHIFT);
435 
436 // g2->Draw("same p0");

440  canvas.SaveAs("TestInteractionArgonDiffX.root");

445 
446 void AddArgonCalculatorGraph(KIntCalculatorArgon* calc, TMultiGraph& mg, int dataColor, int interpolColor) {
447  map<double, double>* data = calc->DEBUG_GetSupportingPoints();
448 
449  const unsigned int POINTS = 5000;
450  const double ENERGY_LOW = 1;
451  const double ENERGY_HIGH = 1e6;
452  const double ENERGY_DELTA = (log10(ENERGY_HIGH) - log10(ENERGY_LOW)) / POINTS;
453 
454  double *x_data = new double[data->size()];
455  double *y_data = new double[data->size()];
456  double *x_inter = new double[POINTS];
457  double *y_inter = new double[POINTS];
458 
459  double sigma, energy;
460  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < POINTS; ++i) {
461  energy = ENERGY_LOW + pow(10, i * ENERGY_DELTA);
462  calc->CalculateCrossSection(energy, sigma);
463 
464  x_inter[i] = energy;
465  y_inter[i] = sigma * 1e20;
466  }
467 
468  unsigned int i = 0;
469  for(map<double, double>::iterator p = data->begin(); p != data->end(); ++p) {
470  x_data[i] = p->first;
471  y_data[i] = p->second * 1e20;
472 
473  ++i;
474  }
475 
476  TGraph* dgraph = new TGraph(data->size(), x_data, y_data);
477  dgraph->SetMarkerColor(dataColor);
478  dgraph->SetLineColor(dataColor);
479  dgraph->SetMarkerStyle(20);
480  dgraph->SetLineWidth(1);
481 
482  TGraph* graph = new TGraph(POINTS, x_inter, y_inter);
483  graph->SetMarkerColor(interpolColor);
484  graph->SetLineColor(interpolColor);
485  graph->SetMarkerStyle(1);
486  graph->SetLineWidth(1);
487 
488  mg.Add(graph);
489  mg.Add(dgraph);
490 }
